name: num::flt2dec::strategy::grisu::format_exact

num::flt2dec::strategy::grisu::format_ex.doc:
The exact and fixed mode implementation for Grisu.

 It returns `None` when it would return an inexact representation otherwise.

num::flt2dec::strategy::dragon::format_e.doc: The exact and fixed mode implementation for Dragon.

option::Option: Unknown([Downcast(VariantIdx(1, ThreadLocalIndex)), Field(0, Ty { id: 829, kind: RigidTy(Tuple([Ty { id: 419, kind: RigidTy(Ref(Region { kind: ReErased }, Ty { id: 423, kind: RigidTy(Slice(Ty { id: 46, kind: RigidTy(Uint(U8)) })) }, Not)) }, Ty { id: 178, kind: RigidTy(Int(I16)) }])) })])

doc:
The exact and fixed mode implementation for Grisu with Dragon fallback.

 This should be used for most cases.
